question: Problem is that my friend’s parents want to marry him with a girl whom he doesn’t want and he does not want to marry there.
answer:
QUESTION
AOA There is a problem with my friend, he told me and gave me permission to consult with you. Problem is that my friend?s parents want to marry him with a girl whom he doesn?t want and he does not want to marry there. His family members also want to marry him there where he doesn?t want. Whenever his family members ask him to marry there he refuses. Now he wants to know that what he should do, weather to marry a girl where he doesn?t want or to do against his parents. He told me ?whenever I think to marry her I get dishearten and once I was so dishearten that I did DUA for my death. I said to my family members to marry me at any other place where they want but not there?. Kindly tell a solution of this problem according to Islam. May Allah give you shadow under His ARSH.
ANSWER


Share:
According to the Shari?ah, you are an adult and you have the independent right to marry a person of your choice.

You may consider the feelings of your family members but if you feel as you had expressed in the details of your query, then you will defeat the purpose of marriage if you proceed with the marriage merely to please family members. You may not fulfil the rights of your wife.

We suggest you identify a person of your choice and make a decision based on Istikhaara.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
